the first is our product called core
which is that cloud native Asset
Management platform essentially helps

platform to do is to make that cont
content accessible and to tailor that
cost to whatever the monetization is

the Amazon web services toolkit the
scalability that's created by things

or or Lambda which is a a brilliant
content Discovery service it makes it

increasingly lowcost storage so on an
average day our platform which has about
10 A5 million Assets in it today will

a big day those could be 10 times as

and the cloud allows us to burst to that
